soundListCommand.label: Sound List Command
soundListCommand.tooltip: Command to get a list of all the sounds, leave empty if you don't want any list command.

soundsFolderPath.label: Path to Sound files
soundsFolderPath.tooltip: Specify the folder to the sounds to trigger. (Include the '/' at the end)

cost.label: Cost to play a sound
cost.tooltip: The cost to play a sound. Duh!

soundListCooldown.label: Sound List Command Cooldown (seconds)
soundListCooldown.tooltip: This is a global cooldown for the command you use to retrieve the sound list.

soundVolume.label: Volume
soundVolume.tooltip: This is the volume applied to the sounds.

perSoundCooldown.label: Sound Cooldown (seconds)
perSoundCooldown.tooltip: This is a the cooldown time for each sound in the folder.

perUserSoundCooldown.label: Per User Sound Cooldown (seconds)
perUserSoundCooldown.tooltip: This is a the cooldown time per user for each sound in the folder.
